programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.title: Raul

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: Duck TV fitness instructors will get you up on your feet and moving. The exercises propel childrens coordination and motoring skills, essential to child development.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: Duck TV fitness instructors will get you up on your feet and moving. The exercises propel childrens coordination and motoring skills, essential to child development.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Get Up!

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. programme.title: Color Clara

This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: This creative kids show for very young viewers welcomes you to the wonderful world of toys. Let your little ones imaginations run wild as children learn through play. Watch games, play, arts and crafts to inspire your pre-schooler.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: Duckys adventures are enriched with the arrival of a new family member, her little brother Fluffy. She encounters many new situations and emotions while adjusting to his arrival.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Fireteam in Action
programme.desc: Fireteam in Action on Duck TV is an animated series revolving around great adventures of firemen. Kids find out about their significant work and learn the importance of helping each other in difficult situations. The series and its sweet characters teach the little viewers to give a helping hand and be responsible.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: Duckys adventures are enriched with the arrival of a new family member, her little brother Fluffy. She encounters many new situations and emotions while adjusting to his arrival.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Good Night!
programme.desc: Unlike most children, Lilis favourite time of the day is bedtime. Lili loves listening to lullabies before drifting off to sleep, especially with her cherished Teddy Bear. Get ready for bed with Lili and Teddy Bear, as their soothing lullabies will help young children settle down and peacefully prepare for bedtime.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Forms Are Yours!
programme.desc: This wonderful and entertaining animated programme for babies and preschoolers reveals the amazing concept of contrast. Children are introduced to different shapes and colours through beautiful contrasting images and animations.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo

programme.title: Beaver Family

It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. programme.title: Mimo and Bobo

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Paranın Yonu

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Ekonominin sıcak gelişmeleri neler? Turkiye ve dunyada neler oluyor? Enflasyondan faize, para ve sermaye piyasalarından uretim ve tuketime kadar ekonomiye dair her ne varsa Gun Ortasında.

programme.title: Lojistik Dunyası
programme.desc: Lojistik Dunyası, Asya, Avrupa ve Afrikanın kesişim noktasında lojistik merkezi ve jeo stratejik konumuyla enerji ve uretim malları geçişinde bulunan Turkiyenin Lojistik sektorundeki yerini uzmanlarla ve uygulayıcılar gozuyle değerlendirip sektore ışık tutuyor. Ayşegul Ketenci ile Lojistik Dunyası Pazar gunu saat 16:00da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Marka Değeri
programme.desc: Turkiyenin ve dunyanın en guçlu markaları hangi değerleri temsil ediyor? Fark yaratan iyi fikirler ekonomik değere nasıl donuşur? Hangi markalara karşı duygusal bağ hissediyorsunuz? Eda Elif Özbek,Turkiyenin onde gelen markalarını, başarı hikayeleriyle ufkumuzu geliştiren, ulkenin ekonomik ve sosyal gelişimine katkı sunan isimlerle EKOTÜRK ekranlarında konuşuyor.

programme.title: Perspektif
programme.desc: Sami Altınkaya soruyor; ekonomi dunyasının saygın ismi Prof. Dr. Kerem Alkin yanıtlıyor. Kuresel ekonomiden diplomasiye, Turkiyeden dunyaya, siyasetten jeopolitik dengelere kadar her şey Perspektifte tartışılıyor. Perspektif, her Salı 11.00de EKOTÜRKte...

programme.title: Fotoğrafın Öykusu
programme.desc: Fotoğrafın Öykusu, fotoğrafların ardındaki hikâyeleri ve ilham kaynaklarını keşfeden sohbet programıdır. Fotoğrafçılar ve sanatçılar, her karedeki duygu ve anlatımı izleyicilerle paylaşır.

programme.title: Akla Ziyan
programme.desc: Akla Ziyan" EKOTÜRK ekranlarında başlıyor... Prof. Dr. Nevzat Tarhan ile birlikte duygulara, zihnin derinliklerine, insanın ozune dokunan bir yolculuğa hazır olun. Sağlıklı bir zihin, guçlu ilişkiler ve doğru iletişim için Eda Özdemirin sunduğu Akla Ziyanda buluşuyoruz. "Akla Ziyan" her Çarşamba 21.30da EKOTÜRKte

programme.title: Yapısal Parite
programme.desc: Yapı sektorunde çok şey değişiyor… Finans dunyasına yeni bir boyut yeni bir donem geliyor… Doğru kararlar, doğru yatırımlar ve tum bileşenlerle Yapısal Parite başlıyor! Yuksek mimar Kıvanç İlhanın sunumuyla Yapısal Parite Pazartesi gunu saat 15.00da Turkiyenin Ekonomi Televizyonu Ekoturkte.

programme.title: Yaşanabilir Dunya
programme.desc: Gelecek nesillere yeşil, sağlıklı, daha yaşanabilir bir dunya bırakmak için neler yapılabilir? Kuresel ısınma ve iklim değişikliği sorunları dunyayı nasıl tehdit ediyor? Biyoçeşitliliği etkileyen onemli faktorler neler? Hepsi, Sibel Topaloğlunun sunduğu Yaşanabilir Dunya programında uzman konuklarla konuşuluyor.

programme.title: Alkin Lakin
programme.desc: İki Kardeş. İkisi de ekonomist, ikisinin de Turkiye ve dunya ekonomisine dair soyleyecek çok sozu var… Bazen benzer, bazense taban tabana zıt ! Kerem Alkin ve Emre Alkin ile Alkin Lakin her Perşembe 21:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Yonetim Katı
programme.desc: Yonetim Kattı, ust duzey yoneticilerin deneyimlerini, iş dunyasındaki trendleri ve başarı hikâyelerini ekranlara taşıyor.

programme.title: Gulşah Çınar ile Portreler
programme.desc: Her bolumde iş dunyasının oncu liderlerini, sanatın ilham veren temsilcilerini ve cemiyet hayatının one çıkan isimlerini konuk eden Gulşah Çınarla Portreler, geleceğe ışık tutacak samimi sohbetler ve çarpıcı anekdotlarla izleyicisini bambaşka dunyalara davet ediyor.

programme.title: Işimiz Sağlık
programme.desc: Hayat değerli, Sağlık en değerli… Diş hekimi Erhan Özgur sağlıkta fark yaratacak, sizin sağlığınıza fayda sağlayacak ozel konu ve konuklarıyla bir araya geliyor.

programme.desc: Enerji sektorunun nabzını tutan Enerji Arenası, EKOTÜRK ekranlarında sizlerle.

programme.desc: Turkiyenin ve dunyanın en guçlu markaları hangi değerleri temsil ediyor? Fark yaratan iyi fikirler ekonomik değere nasıl donuşur? Hangi markalara karşı duygusal bağ hissediyorsunuz? Eda Elif Özbek,Turkiyenin onde gelen markalarını, başarı hikayeleriyle ufkumuzu geliştiren, ulkenin ekonomik ve sosyal gelişimine katkı sunan isimlerle EKOTÜRK ekranlarında konuşuyor.

programme.title: Alkin Lakin
programme.desc: İki Kardeş. İkisi de ekonomist, ikisinin de Turkiye ve dunya ekonomisine dair soyleyecek çok sozu var… Bazen benzer, bazense taban tabana zıt ! Kerem Alkin ve Emre Alkin ile Alkin Lakin her Perşembe 21:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Yapay Zeka Kafası
programme.desc: Kaan Gultenin klonu ve Bilgi Özunal Yuvanın klonu sizlere her hafta yapay zeka alanındaki gelişmeleri anlatacak. Farklı sektorlerden girişimcilerle konuşarak, yapay zeka teknolojilerini somut orneklerle inceleyecek. Yapay Zeka Kafası, her Salı 22.00de Turkiyenin Ekonomi Televizyonu Ekoturkte.

programme.title: Soyut Şeyler Ekonomisi
programme.desc: Ekonomimizin soyut şeylerle yukseleceğine inanan ve soyut şeyler ureterek buna katkı sunan konuklarıyla ulkemizin tarihsel, kulturel ve sanatsal servetini bu toprakların can damarlarına yuklemek gerekliliğini ortaya koyan program Soyut Şeyler Ekonomisinde her hafta birbirinden farklı ve değerli isimler yer alıyor.

programme.title: Perspektif
programme.desc: Sami Altınkaya soruyor; ekonomi dunyasının saygın ismi Prof. Dr. Kerem Alkin yanıtlıyor. Kuresel ekonomiden diplomasiye, Turkiyeden dunyaya, siyasetten jeopolitik dengelere kadar her şey Perspektifte tartışılıyor. Perspektif, her Salı 11.00de EKOTÜRKte...

programme.title: Akla Ziyan
programme.desc: Akla Ziyan" EKOTÜRK ekranlarında başlıyor... Prof. Dr. Nevzat Tarhan ile birlikte duygulara, zihnin derinliklerine, insanın ozune dokunan bir yolculuğa hazır olun. Sağlıklı bir zihin, guçlu ilişkiler ve doğru iletişim için Eda Özdemirin sunduğu Akla Ziyanda buluşuyoruz. "Akla Ziyan" her Çarşamba 21.30da EKOTÜRKte

programme.title: Modoko İle İyilik Zamanı
programme.desc: "Modoko İle İyilik Zamanı", toplumsal dayanışmayı ve yardımı ekranlara taşıyan, ilham verici hikâyelerle dolu bir Ekoturk programıdır.

programme.desc: 1850ler: korkusuz ve sorgulayıcı Bayan Scarlet rahmetli babasının dedektiflik burosunu Mufettiş Wellington (Duk), temizlikçi Ivy ve deneyimli duzenbaz Mosesın yardımları ile idare eder.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Grantchester Papazı Sidney Chambers yalan, ihanet ve cinayetle dolu bir dunyaya suruklendiğinde yeni dedektiflik gorevinde son derece başarılı olduğunu fark eder.

programme.title: Dalgliesh
programme.desc: 1970ler İngilteresinde geçen dizi, gizemli bir dedektif olan Dedektif Jamesin perspektifinden anlatılıyor ve sıra dışı cinayetlerin gizemini çozen Dalglieshin kariyerini gunumuzde takip ediyor.

programme.title: Buyuk Vaatler
programme.desc: 1928: Berline gelen Vicky şehrin en yeni mağazasında satış temsilcisi olarak işe başlar. Piyanist Harryye aşık olması imkansızlıklarla dolu bir aşk hikayesini başlatır.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Barry Josephson ve Hart Hanson’ın yapımcılığı ile Angel dizisinden tanıdığımız David Boreanaz’ın başrolde olduğu Bones, gerçek hayattan esinlenilerek çekilmiş bir drama. Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. Kimlik belirlemede standart metotlar işe yaramaz olduğunda, adli tıp ekipleri Brennan’dan yardım istiyor. Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. programme.title: We Were the Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Sol ve Nechuma tehlikedeyken, Halina ailesi için bir sığınak bulmaya çalışır.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Bir televizyon efsanesi haline gelen, Robert Kirkman imzalı çok sevilen dizi The Walking Dead yedinci sezonunun ilk yarısı grubumuzu dağılmış, yıkılmış ve baskının parmağında toparlanmaya çalışırken buluyoruz. Negan onları başarıyla kontrol altına almış, onlara zorbalıkla onun kuralları altında yaşamayı oğretmiş ve bunu eğer tersini yaparlarsa ne olacağınının zalim orneklerini gostererek yapmış olacak. Negan’ın kimi oldurduğu sorusunun cevabını alacağımız sezonda artık dunya onların duşundukleri yer değil. Daha buyuk ve daha da tehlikeli bir yer.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Justin Hartley, geçmişte yaşadığı sorunlardan dolayı içgudulerini geliştirmiş ve bu yeteneklerini kayıp insanları bulmak ile odulleri toplamak için kullanan Colter Shaw karakteriyle geri donuyor. programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Justin Hartley, TRACKERda hayatta kalma uzmanı Yalnız Kurt Colter Shaw roluyle geri donuyor. Geçen sezonun bomba gibi finalinin ardından ailesinin geçmişiyle ilgili sarsıcı gerçeklerle yuzleşen Colter, artık geçmişi geride bırakmak zorunda. Guvendiği ekibinin de yardımıyla en iyi yaptığı şeye odaklanıyor: İçgudulerini ve hayatta kalma becerilerini kullanarak kayıpları bulup odulleri toplamak.

programme.title: Haber Bulteni

programme.title: Gulşah Ekinci ile Öğle Haberleri
programme.desc: Gulşah Ekincinin sunumuyla Halk TV ekranlarında yayınlanan Öğle Haberleri, Turkiye ve dunyadan one çıkan gelişmeleri tarafsız ve objektif şekilde izleyicilere aktarıyor. Siyasi gelişmeler, ekonomi, toplumsal olaylar ve gunun onemli başlıkları, canlı bağlantılar ve ozel haberlerle desteklenerek kapsamlı bir şekilde sunuluyor. programme.title: Dunyanın Tadı
programme.desc: Dunya mutfaklarından farklı lezzetlerin ve yemek kulturlerinin ekrana taşındığı Dunyanın Tadı, Yasin Esirgençin sunumuyla izleyiciyle buluşuyor. İlginç yemek alışkanlıkları, birbirinden farklı lezzetler ve eşi benzeri gorulmemiş yiyecekler Dunyanın Tadında ekrana getiriliyor.

programme.title: Harunla Şen Yollar
programme.desc: Anadolunun samimiyetini, insan sıcaklığını ve kulturel zenginliğini ekranlara taşıyan "Harunla Şen Yollar", 18 Ekimden itibaren her Cumartesi saat 16:20de Kanal 7deki yerini alacak.

programme.desc: Başkent Kulisi, Mehmet Acetin sunumuyla siyasetin nabzını tutuyor; guncel olaylar, liderlerin yarışları ve topluma etki eden gelişmeler uzman konuklarla ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.desc: Gezelim, ulkemizin ilk ve tek seyahat programı olarak izleyicileri dunyanın dort bir yanına taşıyor.

programme.title: Dunyayı Geziyorum
programme.desc: Milyarlarca insanın oluşturduğu farklı kulturler, farklı yaşamlar Dunyayı Geziyorum ile meraklılarıyla buluşuyor. Gezmeye gormeye fırsat bulamayanlar için dunyanın dort bir yanını ekrana taşıyan Özlem Tunca ve minik oğlu Yakupcan izleyicilerini dunya turuna çıkarıyor.

programme.title: Memleket Gibisi Yok
programme.desc: Sıcak sohbetler, nostaljik hikâyeler ve yerel renklerle dolu bir yolculukla şehrin ruhunu izleyiciye taşıyor.

Memleket hasreti çekenlerin ozlemini dindirmek isteyen Gunduz Gece, Anadolu topraklarının guzelliklerini karış karış dolaşarak Kanal 7de ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Can Yoldaşım

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Üç Kız Kardeş
programme.desc: Turkan, Donuş ve Derya... Üç kız kardeş, anne ve babalarıyla mutlu bir hayat surerken Turkanın yaptığı evlilikle birlikte kara bulutlar ailenin ustunde gezinmeye başlayacak, artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır. Turkan, mahsur kaldığı masalsı şatoda mutsuzluğuna kılıflar dikmeye çalışırken Donuşun hayatı, geçmişten gelen buyuk sırla alt ust olacak, Derya da donuşu olmayan bir yola adım atacaktır.

programme.title: Yabancı Damat
programme.desc: Gaziantepin unlu baklavacısı Kahraman Ustanın kızı Nazlı, Ankara da universite eğitimini bitirmiş memleketine donmuştur. Nazlı yakışıklı, yabancı bir gençle tanışır. Bu genç, ailesi İstanbuldan Atinaya goç etmiş Niko adında bir Yunanlıdır. Nazlı ve Niko birbirlerine deliler gibi aşık olurlar. Ancak Nikonun ailesi Turklerden, Nazlının ailesi de Yunanlılardan pek hoşlanmamaktadır...

programme.title: Konuştukça
programme.desc: Sunuculuğunu Özlem Yıldız yaptığı programda sağlıktan doğal yaşama, guzellikten kişisel bakıma, eğitimden psikolojiye kadar her şey konuşuluyor.

programme.title: Magazin D Cumartesi
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Ardanın Mutfağı
programme.desc: Menude bu hafta çok lezzetli bir Beşamelli Sebzeli Tavuk, bulgurun en lezzetli hallerinden biri Mantarlı Bulgur Pilavı ve tek tek uğraşmanıza gerek kalmayacak bir Kremalı Milfoy Tatlısı var!

programme.title: Guller ve Gunahlar
programme.desc: Tecer Ailesi Berrakın uyanmasını sevinçle karşılarken Serhat, kendisinden saklanan gerçeğin peşinde, Kaderin babasının kim olduğunu oğrenmek istiyordur. Zeynep, artık gitme vaktinin geldiğini duşunerek Berraktan Kaderi kızı olarak kabul etmesini beklerken Berrak tum beklentileri boşa çıkaracak bir hamle yapar.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Herkes heyecanla polislerin içinde olduğu minibusun tahliye edilmesini beklemektedir. Alinin Pınarla iletişim kurması Yağızı rahatsız eder. Diğer yandan Alinin yeni doktoru Yeliz tedaviyi surdurmektedir. Sudenin sırra kadem basması Barışı endişelendirmiştir. Merve ise bu durumdan sıkılmaya başlar. Rami hapisten çıkmıştır. Cevher ve manevi oğlu Balaban onun peşine duşer.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Haber Haftasonu, Merve Dinçkolun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Guller ve Gunahlar
programme.desc: Kader, annesinin etkisi ile Tulay ve Erkanın yanına geri donmuştur. Zeynep, Tecerlerin evinden ayrılarak Kaderi geri almaya uğraşırken Serhat da kızları ile konuşup Berrakı evden gondermenin yollarını arar. O sırada Candan gelen bir telefon Serhatı yine bir seçim yapmaya zorlar.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Herkes heyecanla polislerin içinde olduğu minibusun tahliye edilmesini beklemektedir. Alinin Pınarla iletişim kurması Yağızı rahatsız eder. programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Muzik Arası
programme.desc: Sevilen sanatçıların video klipleri ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Üç Kız Kardeş
programme.desc: Turkan, Donuş ve Derya... Üç kız kardeş, anne ve babalarıyla mutlu bir hayat surerken Turkanın yaptığı evlilikle birlikte kara bulutlar ailenin ustunde gezinmeye başlayacak, artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır. Turkan, mahsur kaldığı masalsı şatoda mutsuzluğuna kılıflar dikmeye çalışırken Donuşun hayatı, geçmişten gelen buyuk sırla alt ust olacak, Derya da donuşu olmayan bir yola adım atacaktır.

programme.title: Yabancı Damat
programme.desc: Gaziantepin unlu baklavacısı Kahraman Ustanın kızı Nazlı, Ankara da universite eğitimini bitirmiş memleketine donmuştur. Nazlı yakışıklı, yabancı bir gençle tanışır. programme.title: Magazin D Pazar
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Evrim Akın İle Ev Gezmesi
programme.desc: Renkli kişiliği ve hoş sohbeti ile izleyicilerin her daim beğenisini kazanan Evrim Akın, birbirinden unlu isimlerin evlerini gezerek çok ozel yaşantılarına tanık oluyor. Yaşam alanlarını çok merak ettiğimiz magazin dunyasının en sevilen isimlerinin evdeki yaşantılarına, mutfaklarına, salonlarına, giyinme odalarına konuk olmaya hazır mısınız?

programme.title: Arda ile Omuz Omuza
programme.desc: Arda Turkmen mutfağında bu hafta guzel oyuncu Dilan Çiçek Denizi ağırlıyor. Arda ve Dilan omuz omuza vererek Hamsi Durum yapıyorlar.

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Ecmelin Cihana açtığı savaş, Albora Ailesini sarsacak bir fırtınaya donuşur. Şahinin oğrendiği gerçek her şeyi altust eder. Boranı azmettirenin kendi babası olduğunu oğrenen Şahin, vicdanının ağırlığı altında ezilir. Gerçeği Cihanlara itiraf ederek af dilerken, hesabı kendi elleriyle keser.

programme.title: Afrika Kıyıları
programme.desc: Afrikanın doğu kıyılarında, sıcak Agulhas akıntısı belirgin bir subtropik doğa parçası ile birlikte guneye doğru akar. Mangrov bataklıklarından renkli mercan resiflerine kadar çeşitli canlılarla orulu bu alanda deniz kaplumbağaları yaşar. Bunlar uzun ve sıcak kumlu sahillerde urer. Yakın tarihte bulunan canlı fosil nufusu olan Coelacanthlar deniz altındaki derin kanyonlarda yaşar.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Yolculuk yapan bir tavukla Amerikayı dolaşın ve bir İngiliz bahçesinde yaşayan bir fare ailesiyle tanışın. Bir orumceğin yardımıyla araknofobiyi yenin, Dunyanın son iki kuzey beyaz gergedanının koruyucusuyla yuruyuşe çıkın ve daha fazla turler arası dostluğu kutlayın.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Kakadu ve ornitorenklerin yeni kariyerlere nasıl ilham verdiğini oğrenin, ardından bir insan ve bir fili omur boyu birbirine bağlayan ortak travmayı keşfedin. 35 yaşındaki hindi akbabası George ile şakalaşın ve insan eliyle yetiştirilen kangurulara dokunaklı biçimde veda edin.

programme.title: Buyulu Ormanın Gizemleri
programme.desc: Bitkilerin ve hayvanların, Dunyanın sunduğu en kurak arazilerden bazılarına nasıl dayandığını oğrenin. Fillere yonelik tabela gorevi goren susamış ağaçlara rastlayın, boceklerin yaşam şansı için nasıl bitkilerle işbirliği yaptığını gorun ve doğal kimyasal savaş hakkında bilgi edinin.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Romantizmin ve goçmen yolcuların mercan resifinin ana otoyollarını doldurduğu, dalgaların altında yatan en fantastik şehri keşfedin. Aşkı arayan bir yeşil deniz kaplumbağasını izleyip yeni doğmuş yavrularına bakan baba deve kuşuna eşlik edin.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Devasa deniz salyangozları mercan avındaki deniz yıldızları çetesini savuştururken olanca sıcaklığıyla yazın gelişini hissedin. Avlarına sinsice yaklaşan kopekbalıklarına eşlik edip papağan balığının hayatta kalmak için burunduğu kılıklara şaşırın.

programme.title: Şehirde Doğal Hayatı Kurtarma
programme.desc: Bir bebek vizon bir mağazada terk edildiğinde, ekip bazı davranış eğitimleri uzerinde çalışmaya başlar. Peki bu tatlı minik, işleri bittiğinde vahşi doğaya çıkacak kadar çetin ceviz olacak mı? İyileşmek için biraz yalnız zaman geçiren, uyuz hastalığına yakalanmış bir çakalı ziyaret edin.

programme.title: Orangutan Orman Okulu
programme.desc: İki oğrencinin yıllar sonra ilk kez ormanda geçirdikleri, donum noktası niteliğindeki ana tanık olun. Başka iki oğrenci daha, ormanda meydana gelen bir kazadan sonra Beninin bacağı ve Lalanın dirseği kırılınca okulun kliniğine kapatılır.

programme.title: Gremlinler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Anne, baba ve uç yavrudan oluşan Indris Ailesinin, Madagaskardaki Mantadia Milli Parkındaki yağmur ormanında bulunan yuvalarındaki yaşamlarından bir gunun oykusu anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Gremlinler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Bu filmde, adada seyahate çıkılarak en çarpıcı doğa parçalarından bazıları ziyaret ediliyor. Amaç, Madagaskardaki turlerin zaman içindeki evrimini irdelemek. Madagaskar tuhaf guzellikte bir yer ve şaşırtıcı sayıdaki habitat ve ozel doğa parçası ile dunyada benzersiz.

programme.title: Gremlinler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Madagaskarın soğukkanlı canlılarının yaşamlarını keşfedin. Bukalemunlar, kurbağalar, kertenkeleler ve yılanlar adada sağ kalmak için uyum sağlamışlardır. Nasıl yiyecek bulduklarına, çoğaldıklarına ve avcılardan kaçındıklarına bakıyoruz.

programme.title: Açlık Oyunları Alaskanın Buyuk Ayı Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Yarışmanın 1. Etabı başlarken 7 ayıyla birlikte kış uykusundan uyanın. Yeni anne BoldFace ile kurtlarla savaşın, minik Stomperın guç ve Blondienin sevgisi için yarıştığını gorun ve yaşlı veteriner Bernienin genç Casanova ile tartışmasını izleyin.

programme.title: Açlık Oyunları Alaskanın Buyuk Ayı Mucadelesi
programme.desc: 1. Etabın kazananları ve yeni uyelerle birlikte Temmuzdaki somon yarışına katılın. BigBoinin yiyecek bulma yolculuğuna eşlik edin, QuadMom ve RedBacki ziyafete davet edin ve BoldFacein hayatta kalan yavrusunu guvende tutup tutamayacağını gorun.

programme.title: Açlık Oyunları Alaskanın Buyuk Ayı Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Buz gibi bir Ekim fırtınası bitiş çizgisine giden yarışı zorlaştırırken sıkı giyinin. QuadMomın trajedisinden once Big Boinin geri donuşunu izleyin ve favori BoldFacein çocuğu Raccoona rağmen hızlanmasına tezahurat edin. Ama tacı kim takacak?

programme.title: Hindistanın Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Rajan, olağandışı buyuklukte bir grubun başına duran guçlu bir alfa erkek. Boyle buyuk bir grubu bugune kadar iyi bir şekilde getirdi ama gelecek çok parlak gorunmuyor. Besleyecek daha fazla ağız var ama yuvası olan orman kuçuluyor.

programme.title: Hindistanın Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Antik Jodhpur kentinin kıyısına kıvrılmış yemyeşil Tapınak Bahçeleri, bolluk içinde, huzur dolu bir yaşam suren, devasa bir Hanuman Langurları topluluğuna ev sahipliği yapıyor. Ancak bu topluluğun sıkı bir hiyerarşisi var.

programme.title: Hindistanın Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Hindistanın guneyindeki sıcak ve nemli tropik ormanlarda, dişi bir Kral Kobra bir gorev uzerinde çalışıyor. Bir eş bulması, yiyecek bulması ve yumurtlaması gerekli. Tum bunları, 5 ay içinde muson mevsimi başlamadan yapmalı. Bu konuda yalnız değil. Balta girmemiş ormandaki birçok hayvan için yavrulama mevsimi. Erkekler bir eş bulma umudu ile dişilerin dikkatini çekmeye çabalıyorlar. Yağmur mevsimi gelmeden once herkes istediğini alacak ve gelecek nesli garantileyecek mi?

programme.title: Hindistanın Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Hindistanın guneyindeki ormanlarda, acımasız yaz sıcağı her gun su içmeleri gereken Asyalı filler için zorluklar çıkarıyor. Bilge ve yaşlı bir dişi aile reisi olan Anura, etrafındaki sular tukenince, ailesinin hayatta kalması için yıllık goçte onlara onderlik etme vaktinin geldiğini anlıyor. Yolculuğunu daha da onemli kılan etmen, suruye yeni katılan 3 aylık erkek torunu Navin. Bu yaşamı boyunca edindiği bilgileri ailenin genç fertlerine aktarması için son fırsatlarından biri de olabilir.

programme.title: Primatların Ülkesi
programme.desc: Bundan milyonlarca yıl once, karaya vuran canlılar kendilerini Madagaskarın engebeli kıyılarında yapayalnız buldular. Anakaradan yalıtılmış olan bu adanın yeni sakinleri evrim surecinden geçti. Burası, gozlerden ırak tropik yuvalarına mukemmel biçimde uyum sağlamış nadir ve eşsiz canlıların olduğu sihirli bir dunya.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Waterfront Pride ile tanışın Erkekler Tom Tom ile Caller, 8 dişi aslan, 10 genç ve evini bekleyen yetişkin yavru Einstein. Einsteinın efelenmesine Outsiders Pridelı rakiplerinin onun kaderini çizen hamleleriyle verdikleri karşılığa tanıklık edin.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Kuraklık onları (ve avlarını) olumcul bir tehlikeye atarken surunun yiyecek için avlandığı anlardaki gerilimi hissedin. Einsteinin yalnızlığa adapte oluşunu izleyip yeni anne Kalwezinin yavruları için verdiği mucadelenin hasar tespitini yapın.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Her yeri yeşertirken aslanların kamuflajını berbat eden yağmur mevsiminin zorluklarıyla başa çıkın. Einsteinın yeni bağlar kurma başarısızlığını, Keeza ile yavrusu rakibi Deligoz Moody tarafından kaçırıldığında artılarla eksileri tartışını izleyin.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Sel suları çekilir ve buyuk yırtıcı hayvan suruleri Chobe Nehri kıyılarına geri donerken bereketli bir mevsimi selamlayın. Keeza ile yavrusunun kaçışlarını, Caller ile Tom Tomun duşmanlarıyla kavgalarını izleyip Einsteinın eş bulmasına sevinin.

programme.title: Jaguar Gunlukleri
programme.desc: Lizzie ve Onçafari ekibiyle birlikte Pantanalda kayıp baskın erkek jaguarı aramaya çıkın. Onun gucunu gasp etmek ve Fera ile diğer yerel dişilerin dostluğunu kazanmak isteyen yabancı Badalo gibi genç adaylar arasındaki mucadeleyi takip edin.

programme.title: Jaguar Gunlukleri
programme.desc: Zıpır yavrusu Simbaya ağaçlara nasıl tırmanılacağını ve nasıl avlanılacağını oğretirken Pantanalın Kraliçesi Ferayı tanıyın. Ardından, başka bir dişi olan Ferinhanın, erkekler gelip yavruları tehdit ettikçe neden annelikte zorlandığını oğrenin.

programme.title: Jaguar Gunlukleri
programme.desc: Takip tasmaları kaybolan Ferinha, Fera ve Badaloyu arayan ekibe yağmur sezonu sonrası tekrar katılın. Lizzienin jaguarlara, daha fazla veri kaydedecek yuksek teknolojili bir cihaza sahip yeni tasmalar takmasına yardımcı olan bir biyologla tanışın.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Waterfront Pride ile tanışın Erkekler Tom Tom ile Caller, 8 dişi aslan, 10 genç ve evini bekleyen yetişkin yavru Einstein. Einsteinın efelenmesine Outsiders Pridelı rakiplerinin onun kaderini çizen hamleleriyle verdikleri karşılığa tanıklık edin.
